My childhood game huh? When i was 5 my brother played counter strike 1.6 on an old computer and i always looked at it and i didn't get it. Only when I was 12 years old did I buy it and I couldn't dream. I found a server there called HnS autobhop block < I recommend, probably the best server to play with. Even though it's been a lot of years since I played it, I still have good memories of it, if you want to buy it just for it.
Can't go wrong with this classic.
